#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;

	while(t--)
	{

		int times[300] = {};
		
		string str;
		cin >> str;

		for(int i = 0; i < str.size(); ++i)
			++times[str[i]];

		int maxi = 0, posi;
		for(int i = 0; i < 300; ++i)
			if(times[i] > maxi)
				maxi = times[i], posi = i;
		
		for(int i = 0; i < str.size(); ++i)
			   if(str[i] == posi)
			   		str[i] = '?';

		cout << str << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
